page.title: 20A GOOD PLACE TO VISIT.
page.content:
This area,with it's small villages,is a very good place to live.There is the surrounding countryside giving peace and quiet and the beauty of nature.Then there are the numerous towns within easy reach to use for their wide variety of facilities.The blend of old and new makes it an interesting place to visit and the people are more than willing to tell you about their village.
{THE CHILDREN AND STAFF OF INKBERROW {FIRST SCHOOL, WOULD LIKE TO THANK THE {MANY PEOPLE OF INKBERROW,ABBOTS {MORTON, AND RADFORD, WHO HAVE GIVEN SO {MUCH HELP WITH OUR WORK FOR THIS {SURVEY. }
